name: NOTE_EXT_SIGNERS
description: Note signer information for auto-reconciled external notes.

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the note record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EXT_NOTE_SIGNER_NAME
columns.description: An auto-reconciled external note signer's name.

columns.name: EXT_NOTE_SIGNING_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: An auto-reconciled external note signing instant for a note signer.

columns.name: EXT_NOTE_SIGNER_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description: External note signer's role in authenticating the content of an auto-reconciled external note.
